perks.name: Remove category
perks.description: Remove a category from someone. The player won't be able to play that category for the next 5 rounds

perks.name: Give it to me baby!
perks.description: You get one point from each player! Yay!

perks.name: Robin Hood!
perks.description: The one with most points generously donates #INSERTHERE# points to the one with fewest. Feels good, right?

perks.name: Robin Hood!
perks.description: The one with most points generously donates them to the one with fewest. Feels good, right?

perks.name: Turn baby turn!
perks.description: Time to switch direction! Next turn is #INSERHERE#

perks.name: RPS!
perks.description: Play rock paper scissors with #INSERTHERE# for a point!
